String.string: Into the Furnace
Hope we don't run out of time.
Meet the escaped human apprentice.
[Habere] Ask Primus Gahreed about the escaped apprentice.
"Thanks for your time."
[Habere] Go to the escaped human apprentice from the Divine Furnace, and ask about the situation at the Divine Furnace.
[Habere] Ask Primus Gahreed about where the escaped apprentice was rescued.
Begin your escort.
I'm saved! Thank you!
[Plain of the Damned] Destroy the horse carriage and rescue the apprentices, then escort them safely to Habere.
[Habere] Find out about the situation at the Divine Furnace from the rescued popori apprentices.
Popori Apprentice
Thulsa's Shield Schematic
[Habere] Show Engineer Gaicus the schematic and ask how the shield can be destroyed.
"I'll get it."
Molten Chamber entrance
You found the entrance to the Molten Chamber.
[Plain of the Damned] Go to the entrance of the Molten Chamber of the Divine Furnace.
[You can enter the Molten Chamber by destroying Thulsa's Magic Stone.] Find Muhrak in the Molten Chamber.
Let's move! Meet me in my workshop in Habere.
[Molten Chamber] Protect Muhrak from the Legion of Thulsa.
"We're done here."
[Habere] Teleport to the workshop and speak to Muhrak.
